verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6485>numbered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, and <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> over them.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What <S%H5869>seemeth<s%> you <S%H3190>best<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H3027>side<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> by <S%H3967>hundreds<s%> and by <S%H505>thousands<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> when the <S%H4428>king<s%> gave all the <S%H8269>captains<s%> <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H1697>concerning<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

¶ So the <S%H5971>people<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> into the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was in the <S%H3293>wood<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>;

For the <S%H4421>battle<s%> was there <S%H6327>scattered<s%> over the <S%H6440>face<s%> of all the <S%H776>country<s%>: and the <S%H3293>wood<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> than the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H398>devoured<s%>.

¶ And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7122>met<s%> the <S%H6440%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. And the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, <S%H3863>Though<s%> I should <S%H8254>receive<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> shekels of <S%H3701>silver<s%> in mine <S%H3709>hand<s%>, yet would I not put <S%H7971>forth<s%> mine <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%>: for in our <S%H241>hearing<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6680>charged<s%> thee and <S%H52>Abishai<s%> and <S%H863>Ittai<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H8104>Beware<s%> that none touch the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>.

<S%H176>Otherwise<s%> I should have <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H8267>falsehood<s%> against mine own <S%H5315>life<s%>: for there is no <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H3582>hid<s%> from the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and thou thyself wouldest have <S%H3320>set<s%> thyself against me.

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7626>darts<s%> in his <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and <S%H8628>thrust<s%> them through the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, while he was yet <S%H2416>alive<s%> in the midst of the <S%H424>oak<s%>.

¶ Now <S%H53>Absalom<s%> in his <S%H2416>lifetime<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> and reared <S%H5324>up<s%> for himself a <S%H4678>pillar<s%>, which is in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6010>dale<s%>: for he <S%H559>said<s%>, I have no <S%H1121>son<s%> to keep my <S%H8034>name<s%> in <S%H2142>remembrance<s%>: and he <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H4678>pillar<s%> after his own <S%H8034>name<s%>: and it is <S%H7121>called<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H53>Absalom's<s%> <S%H3027>place<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, But <S%H4100>howsoever<s%>, let me, I pray thee, also <S%H7323>run<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3569>Cushi<s%>. And <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Wherefore wilt thou <S%H7323>run<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, seeing that thou hast no <S%H1309>tidings<s%> <S%H4672>ready<s%>?

But howsoever, said he, let me <S%H7323>run<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H7323>Run<s%>. Then <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain<s%>, and <S%H5674>overran<s%> <S%H3569>Cushi<s%>.

And <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, All is <S%H7965>well<s%>. And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Turn <S%H5437>aside<s%>, and <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H3541>here<s%>. And he turned <S%H5437>aside<s%>, and stood <S%H5975>still<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> was much <S%H7264>moved<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H5944>chamber<s%> over the <S%H8179>gate<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>: and as he <S%H3212>went<s%>, thus he <S%H559>said<s%>, O my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>! would God I had <S%H4191>died<s%> for <S%H5414>thee<s%>, O <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>, my <S%H1121>son<s%>!
